name: Stockshifters
overview:
Stockshifters.com is Europe’s fastest growing marketplace for wholesale, clearance and surplus stock. With a trade community of more than 100,000 members, Stockshifters works with some of the UK’s top retailers, SME retailers, E-tailers and trade distributors to deliver efficiencies to the way buyers and suppliers trade goods.

Stockshifters aims to help traders develop profitable long-term business by offering exclusive access to the best stock deals online. Some of the leading names in retail, manufacturing and wholesale have signed up to sell their clearance and surplus stock through Stockshifters.com and we’re securing more exclusive relationships each day.

Stockshifters offers buyers a fast, transparent and secure platform to buy stock to resell. Suppliers can use Stockshifters as a free sales channel to clear wholesale, end of line or surplus stock and maximise its return. We’re on a journey to change the way that well-known brands sell, giving traders a unique opportunity to develop the way they buy and profit from quality wholesale clearance and surplus stock.

Stockshifters is owned by Recoverex Ltd, a London based private backed Internet start-up led by a management team with over 15 years industry experience.
